anchorMove.name: Expert Luck Special
anchorMove.description: When you spend Luck, you discover something happening now is related to something you were involved in years ago.

additionalMoves.name: I’ve Read About This Sort Of Thing
additionalMoves.description: Roll +Sharp instead of +Cool when you act under pressure.

additionalMoves.name: Precise Strike
additionalMoves.description: When you inflict harm on a monster, you can aim for a weak spot. Roll +Tough. On a 10+, you inflict +2 harm. On a 7–9, you inflict +1 harm. On a miss, you leave yourself open to the monster.

additionalMoves.name: Haven
additionalMoves.description: You have a haven, a safe place to work (pick three).

arrays.title: Haven Options
values: Lore Library: When you hit the books, take +1 forward to investigate a mystery (as long as historical reference works are appropriate).
Mystical Library: If you use your library’s occult tomes and grimoires to prepare yourself, take +1 forward to use magic.
Protection Spells: Your haven is safe from monsters—they cannot enter. Monsters might be able to do something special to evade the wards, but not easily.
Armory: When you need a special weapon, roll +Weird. 10+: you have it (plenty if that matters). 7–9: you have it, but only the minimum. Miss: you’ve got the wrong thing.
Infirmary: You can heal people and have the space for one or two to recuperate. The Keeper will tell you how long recovery takes and if you need extra supplies or help.
Workshop: Space for building and repairing guns, cars, and gadgets. Work with the Keeper to determine time and supplies.
Oubliette: An isolated room from every kind of monster, spirit, or magic you know about. Anything stashed there can’t be found, can’t do any magic, and can’t get out.
Panic Room: Essential supplies; protected by normal and mystical means. You can hide there for a few days, safe from pretty much anything.
Magical Laboratory: A mystical lab with weird ingredients and tools useful for casting spells (use magic, big magic, and similar moves).

additionalMoves.name: Gear Options
additionalMoves.description: Options shown on the playbook sheet.

Cold iron sword (2 harm, hand, messy, iron)
Blessed knife (2 harm, hand, holy)
Magical dagger (2 harm, hand, magic)
Juju bag (1 harm, far, magic)
Flamethrower (3 harm, close, fire, heavy, volatile)
Magnum (3 harm, close, reload, loud)
Shotgun (3 harm, close, messy, loud)
